data.name: DocumentSettings
desc: describes properties that apply to the whole drawing document.

properties.name: IsPrintFitPage
desc: enables or disables the fitting of the page to the printable area during print

properties.name: IsPrintTilePage
desc: if this is true and the paper size for printing is larger than the paper size of the printer than the content is tiled over multiple pages.

properties.name: MeasureUnit
desc: This is the default logical measure unit that is used for string formatting inside the document, f.e.

properties.name: PageNumberFormat
desc: is the number format used for page number fields

properties.name: ParagraphSummation
desc: If this is true, the distance between two paragraphs is the sum of ParaBottomMargin of the previous and ParaTopMargin of the next paragraph.
If false, only the greater of the two is chosen.

properties.name: ScaleDenominator
desc: is the denominator for the logical scale of the document

properties.name: ScaleNumerator
desc: is the numerator for the logical scale of the document
